title: Mexican Billionaire Carlos Slim Snaps Up More Assets in Oil Push
description: Carlos Slim’s foray into Mexico’s offshore oil market shows no signs of abating, with the Mexican media magnate now planning to spend $270 million on the remaining shares of oil fields off the coast of Campeche.
